author: Staff Reporter
text:
222 boxes of

T-shirts seized

The election flying squad seized 222 boxes of T-shirts each containing 10 T-shirts when they were being transported without relevant documents near here on Sunday.

The flying squad led by Tahsildar Sumathi was conducting vehicles checks at Kunnathur junction near Kadaladi, when they intercepted a goods carrier that contained 222 boxes of T-shirts. Since there was no documents to support the driver’s claim the consignment was seized. — Staff Reporter
title: Election squad seizes 222 boxes of T-shirts
